channel.title: Guys can anyone explain how to use my domain to make a website?
channel.description: I'm new to this subject. I have a domain from tagadab, however i do not know how to setup my website using this. Help?

item.title: Guys can anyone explain how to use my domain to make a website?
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Arcik:

You’re going to need a web host which are pretty cheap, i’m only paying $60 a year for mine for unlimited everything (lol) prices may vary from each company. If you have a web host already there should be some settings/configurations for your domain allowing you to point it your web host. I’d suggest you just open a support ticket or ask live chat since they’ll do everything for you!

$60 a year? I pay £9 a year

Read full topic
item.source: Guys can anyone explain how to use my domain to make a website?

item.title: Guys can anyone explain how to use my domain to make a website?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

If you know how to create basic html pages etc
A web host more or less allows you to upload those files to the public can view them.

^ Don’t want to go in much detail
